title: Free Comic Book Day 2024: Ultimate Universe/Spider-Man (2024 - Present)

issues.title: Free Comic Book Day 2024: Ultimate Universe/Spider-Man (2024) #1
issues.description: Just weeks ahead of AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #50, get the first taste of THE RETURN OF THE GOBLIN! Plus, prepare for the next evolutionary step of the Ultimate Universe as a powerful new hero debuts! But it doesn't end there! Oh no, there are some surprises up our sleeve on this one!
